bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou 瘺 , fistula, developing on a female’s breast. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry wang bu liu xing 王不留行：止心煩，鼻衄，癰疽惡瘡瘺乳，婦人難產 , “It ends heart vexation, nosebleed, obstruction-illnesses and impediment-illnesses, malign sores, fistula breast , as well as difficult birthing among women”. Lou shi 瘺蝕 , fistula erosion [6]
Alternative Names lou lan 瘺爛 , fistula festering.

Pathological Condition of festering lou chuang 瘺瘡 , fistula sores. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry yan shu 鼴鼠：主癰 疽，諸瘺蝕惡瘡 , “It controls obstruction-illnesses, impediment-illnesses, and all types of fistula erosion and malign sores”.
